issue.title: [C++] Remove duplicated AssertArraysEqual code in parquet/arrow/arrow-reader-writer-test.cc
issue.body:

comments.body:

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3773?focusedCommentId=16684424) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
I think he's referring to the redundant code here https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/cpp/src/parquet/arrow/arrow-reader-writer-test.cc#L340. I will move this issue to Arrow
